name: Climb (Cave Story)
description:
Current Version: 1.1

This is a very small fan game based off of Cave Story. The objective is to simply climb the room you are in. This game may be updated in the future to remove the barrier in the 3rd room and add more content.

Controls

This game supports 2 Players. Player 2 will join as Toroko.

This game supports controllers. Not all controllers may work.

P1:

Jump - Z

Movement - Arrows

Inspect - Down

P2:

Jump/Join - J

Movement - W, A, S, D

Inspect - S

Both:

Pause - Enter

Controllers:

Toggle for P1 - Left Stick Button (or C on the keyboard)

Toggle for P2 (Can be used to join) - Right Stick Button (or L on the keyboard)

Jump - Bottom Face Button

Movement - Left Stick/D-Pad

Inspect - Down on Left Stick/D-Pad

Pause - Start Button

To Fullscreen, press Alt and Enter.

You can save at any floppy disk. To erase your save, hold either left shift on the keyboard or the top face button on a controller while inspecting the save. A bomb symbol should appear above your head to symbolize that you've erased your save.

If you like this game and haven't played Cave Story, either go buy the Plus version for Nintendo Switch or download the english translation of the original game on the official website:

Download Cave Story - Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari), A Tribute Site
